alert.note: Alert for Mecklenburg (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 09 at 9:12PM EST until further notice by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Wakefield VA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Virginia... Allen Creek near Boydton affecting Mecklenburg County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Allen Creek near Boydton. * WHEN...From this evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 16.5 feet, Hayes Mill Road begins to flood about 100 Feet east of Allen Creek. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 PM EST Tuesday the stage was 15.2 feet. - Bankfull stage is 13.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:30 PM EST Tuesday was 15.2 feet. - Forecast...The creek will continue to rise potentially reaching 16.5ft, which would begin to flood Hayes Mill Road east of Allen Creek. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - Flood History...This level compares to a previous crest of 15.2 feet on 04/25/2017. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Wednesday morning at 915 AM EST.
